name: Trends
description: For 2-5 players. Trends is the one and only game powered by the Internet. Players pit search terms against each-other to see which is more highly ranked by search traffic.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: shader model 4.0 support DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 75 MB available space
